PodBean.title: PodBean Settings
PodBean.description: You can get these settings from PodBean's developer center at https://developers.podbean.com/

ClientId.title: Client ID
ClientId.description: The Client ID provided from the "My Apps" section of PodBean's developer portal. See the following screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/YpkclUu.png

ClientSecret.title: Client Secret
ClientSecret.description: The Client Secret provided from the "My Apps" section of PodBean's developer portal. See the following screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/QysM3Bn.png

ChannelId.title: Channel ID
ChannelId.description: How to get your channel ID: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tUhIA3pIHSQ

PollingRate.title: Polling Rate
PollingRate.description: How many seconds should we wait before checking YouTube again?

TitlePattern.title: Title Pattern
TitlePattern.description:
Regular expression (regex) pattern that decides if a video should be uploaded to PodBean.
Complete guide on regex: https://code.tutsplus.com/tutorials/you-dont-know-anything-about-regular-expressions-a-complete-guide--net-7869

TitleNegativePattern.title: Title Skip Pattern
TitleNegativePattern.description:
If this regular expression (regex) passes, then the video will be skipped.
Complete guide on regex: https://code.tutsplus.com/tutorials/you-dont-know-anything-about-regular-expressions-a-complete-guide--net-7869

CustomVideos.title: List of Videos That Should be Manually Processed
CustomVideos.description: If you have some videos that you want to consider, even though they don't match the patterns, you can put their URLs here.

Pickle.title: Pickle Settings (Advanced)
Pickle.description: Do not touch these settings unless you know what you're doing.

Server.title: Server Settings (Advanced)
Server.description: Do not touch these settings unless you know what you're doing.
